meanings.definition: A hairstyle in which the hair is braided closely to the scalp in rows.
meanings.sent1: She wore beautiful cornrows to the party.
meanings.sent2: Her cornrows looked neat and stylish.
meanings.sent3: The little girl giggled as she got her cornrows done.
meanings.sent4: The cornrows on her head resembled neat rows of crops in a field.
meanings.sent5: The intricate cornrows made her stand out in the crowd.

meanings.sent1: She learned how to cornrow her hair from her grandmother.
meanings.sent2: He decided to cornrow his hair for a change.
meanings.sent3: The hairstylist expertly cornrowed her hair in record time.
meanings.sent4: She cornrows her hair every summer for a unique look.
meanings.sent5: Cornrowing her hair was a skill she mastered with practice.
